com.alexkasko.tasks
Class TaskEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.alexkasko.tasks.TaskEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class TaskEngine
extends Object
implements Runnable

Engine for asynchronous multistage suspendable tasks. Processes task stages one by one using provided Executor, tasks stage will be updated between stages processing. Task status will be updated on error, suspend or after successful processing of last stage. Processors should call checkSuspended(long) method periodically, it will throw TaskSuspendedException on successful check.

Author:
alexkasko Date: 5/17/12
See Also:
Task, TaskManager, TaskProcessorProvider, TaskStageChain, TaskStageProcessor, TaskSuspendedException
